message.content:
To calculate the Net Profit Margin, I need to divide the Net Profit by the Total Revenue and express it as a percentage.

The income statement shows:
- Net Profit: 963,263.19
- Total Revenue: 3,025,437.82

Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = (963,263.19 / 3,025,437.82) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 0.3184 × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 31.84%

Rounding to two decimal places:

```json
{"solution": {'Net Profit Margin': '31.84%'}}
```
